column1: Ramjibanpur is a city and a municipality in the Ghatal subdivision of the Paschim Medinipur district in the Indian state of West Bengal.
Ramjibanpur is located at 22.83°N 87.62°E﻿ / 22.83; 87.62. It has an average elevation of 11 metres (36 feet).
